quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Do not judge me by my success, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.text: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo far more flexible than you'd ever believe at first glance.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.text: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Do the hardwork especially if you don't feel like it
quotes.author: Hamza

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
